name: farming
title: Agriculture and farming
desc: Rearing of animals or cultivation of plants, for example agriculture, irrigation, aquaculture, plantations, herding, pests and diseases affecting crops and livestock

name: biota
title: Flora or fauna
desc: Flora or fauna in natural environment, for example wildlife, vegetation, biological sciences, ecology, wilderness, sea life, wetlands, habitat, biological resources

name: boundaries
title: Census and administrative boundaries
desc: Legal land descriptions, for example political and administrative boundaries, governmental units, marine boundaries, voting districts, school districts, international boundaries

name: climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere
title: Climatology Meteorology and Atmosphere
desc: Processes and phenomena of the atmosphere, for example cloud cover, weather, climate, atmospheric conditions, climate change, precipitation

name: economy
title: Business and economic
desc: Economic activities, conditions, and employment, for example production, labor, revenue, business, commerce, industry, tourism and ecotourism, forestry, fisheries, commercial or subsistence hunting, exploration and exploitation of resources such as minerals, oil and gas

name: elevation
title: Elevation and derived products
desc: Height above or below sea level, for example altitude, bathymetry, digital elevation models, slope, derived products, DEMs, TINs

name: environment
title: Environment and conservation
desc: Environmental resources, protection and conservation, for example environmental pollution, waste storage and treatment, environmental impact assessment, monitoring environmental risk, nature reserves, landscape, water quality, air quality, environmental modeling

name: geoscientificInformation
title: Geological and geophysical
desc: Information pertaining to earth sciences, for example geophysical features and processes, geology, minerals, sciences dealing with the composition, structure and origin of the earth's rocks, risks of earthquakes, volcanic activity, landslides, gravity information, soils, permafrost, hydrogeology, groundwater, erosion

name: health
title: Health
desc: Health, health services, human ecology, and safety, for example disease and illness, factors affecting health, hygiene, substance abuse, mental and physical health, health services, health care providers, public health

name: imageryBaseMapsEarthCover
title: Imagery, base maps, and land cover
desc: Base maps, for example land/earth cover, topographic maps, imagery, unclassified images, annotations, digital ortho imagery

name: intelligenceMilitary
title: Military and intelligence
desc: Military bases, structures, activities, for example barracks, training grounds, military transportation, information collection

name: inlandWaters
title: Inland water resources
desc: Inland water features, drainage systems and characteristics, for example rivers and glaciers, salt lakes, water utilization plans, dams, currents, floods and flood hazards, water quality, hydrographic charts, watersheds, wetlands, hydrography

name: location
title: Locations and geodetic networks
desc: Positional information and services, for example addresses, geodetic networks, geodetic control points, postal zones and services, place names, geographic names

name: oceans
title: Oceans
desc: Features and characteristics of salt water bodies (excluding inland waters), for example tides, tidal waves, coastal information, reefs, maritime, outer continental shelf submerged lands, shoreline

name: planningCadastre
title: Cadastral/Planning
desc: Information used for appropriate actions for future use of the land, for example land use maps, zoning maps, cadastral surveys, land ownership, parcels, easements, tax maps, federal land ownership status, public land conveyance records

name: society
title: Cultural, society, and demographic
desc: Characteristics of society and culture, for example settlements, housing, anthropology, archaeology, education, traditional beliefs, manners and customs, demographic data, tourism, recreational areas and activities, parks, recreational trails, historical sites, cultural resources, social impact assessments, crime and justice, law enforcement, census information, immigration, ethnicity

name: structure
title: Building Infrastructure
desc: Man-made construction, for example buildings, museums, churches, factories, housing, monuments, shops, towers, building footprints, architectural and structural plans

name: transportation
title: Transportation networks
desc: Means and aids for conveying persons or goods, for example roads, airports/airstrips, shipping routes, tunnels nautical charts, vehicle or vessel location, aeronautical charts, railways

name: utilitiesCommunication
title: Utilities/Communication
desc: Energy, water and waste systems and communications infrastructure and services, for example hydroelectricity, geothermal, solar and nuclear sources of energy, water purification and distribution, sewage collection and disposal, electricity and gas distribution, data communication, telecommunication, radio, communication networks

name: historic
title: Historical Scanned Maps
desc: Non-digital maps that have been scanned
